description: C o m m e n t a r y   o n   A v e r r o e ̈ s ' s   T a l k h i ̄ s ̣   K i t a ̄ b   a l - n a f s   ( P a r a p h r a s e   o n   A r i s t o t l e ' s   O r g a n o n )
title: Commentary on Averroës's Talkhīṣ Kitāb al-nafs (Paraphrase on Aristotle's Organon)
